jp.go.aist.six.vuln.repository.scap.nvd

Interface NvdRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpNvdRepositoryClient, NvdRepositoryImpl

    public interface NvdRepository
    The prescription of the NVD repository interface. This repository provides the NVD/CVE vulnerability entries and the CPE dictionary items.
    Version:
    $Id: NvdRepository.java 606 2013-06-13 06:10:20Z nakamura5akihito@gmail.com $
    Author:
    Akihito Nakamura, AIST
    See Also:
    National Vulnerability Database (NVD)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long countCpeItem()
      Returns the number of CPE items in the database.
      long countCpeItem(jp.go.aist.six.util.repository.QueryParams params)
      Returns the number of CPE items that match the specified query parameters.
      long countVulnerability()
      Returns the number of vulnerability entries in the database.

      Returns the number of vulnerability entries that match the specified query parameters.

      Returns all the CPE items in the database.

      Searches for the CPE items that match the specified query parameters.
